pages.title: Sit
pages.text: $(bold)Sit$() is not a difficult command to teach a Pet Rockâ„¢ as they spend the bulk of their time sitting.$(br2)However, a refresher course if recommended since you want your rock to sit when you want it to, not when it wants to.$(br2)Place your rock in the training area and give it the command $(bold)Sit$().
Many rocks will attempt to deceive you by lying down, thinking that you won't be able to tell the difference.$(br2)You should repeat the command until they sit properly as told.
